thread.title: Promotional Marketing Expert Danette Gossett Promotes Stand Out Holiday Gift Giving Idea
thread.title_full: Promotional Marketing Expert Danette Gossett Promotes Stand Out Holiday Gift Giving Idea | MENAFN.COM

author: Press
title: Promotional Marketing Expert Danette Gossett Promotes Stand Out Holiday Gift Giving Idea
text:
(MENAFN Press) Owner and President of Gossett Marketing a leading promotional marketing firm Danette Gossett suggests getting a jump-start on holiday gift giving and catching clients prospects and employees off-guard. 
MIAMI FL– August 28 2015  – Danette Gossett Founder of Gossett Marketing Communications Inc. Co-Founder of Promotions Resource LLC and co-author of the best-selling book Transform recently posted a new blog on her website entitled “Show Your Thanks By Giving at Thanksgiving.”  Summer has not yet come to an end and thoughts of holiday gift giving have already come to mind. At least to Danette Gossett who helps corporations and businesses promote themselves through the gifts they give.
As Ms. Gossett writes “If you really want to be perceived as an exceptional forward thinking company get a jump on your holiday gift giving.” She continues adding “After all Thanksgiving is a more appropriate time to express your thanks to clients employees prospects and anyone else you want to impress.”
Gossett offers examples advising “Think about sharing food. That’s what Thanksgiving is all about. Think about the individuals and groups you are giving to as well.” She offers the following suggestions “From fine chocolates to popular popcorn filled tins gourmet cookies to locally sourced or International goodie baskets there’s something to please everyone. For something more personal you might consider giving nice journals pen sets power banks speakers gift sets of business accessories and more.”
According to Gossett “Giving gifts at an off time catches people off guard. It makes your gift stand out more memorably in the minds of the recipients.”  She adds “August is a great time to start planning ahead so you’ll be certain of getting what you want when you want it. Also keep in mind that factories get busier as the holidays get closer and production times increase.”
The entire blog can be read at 
About Danette Gossett 
Danette brings more than 30 years of experience developing advertising campaigns direct marketing programs and sales promotions to her clients. Prior to starting her companies she worked for New York advertising agencies including Saatchi & Saatchi & Lowe Marschalk. Her corporate experience included National Advertising Director for Avis Rent a Car Systems Inc. and Director of Marketing Services for Royal Caribbean Cruise Line.

About Gossett Marketing 
Gossett Marketing is celebrating its 23rd year as a promotional marketing agency. We strive to become your partner in business not just another vendor. We approach every project utilizing our more than 33 years of New York advertising agency and corporate marketing experience to bring creative solutions to all your promotional marketing needs.  We know how to drive results with promotional marketing programs. We strive to understand your brand strategy and will ensure your message integrity.
